channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Rational Collaborative Lifecycle Management
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Rational Collaborative Lifecycle Management

item.title: CVE-2018-1658|2024-09-16T16:14:06.764Z -- ibm -- rational%20collaborative%20lifecycle%20management
item.description: IBM Jazz Foundation (IBM Rational Collaborative Lifecycle Management 5.0 through 6.0.6) is vulnerable to HTTP header injection, caused by improper validation of input. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject arbitrary HTTP headers, which will allow the attacker to conduct various attacks against the vulnerable system, including cross-site scripting, cache poisoning or session hijacking. IBM X-Force ID: 144884.

item.title: CVE-2017-1237|2024-09-16T16:37:58.397Z -- ibm -- rational%20collaborative%20lifecycle%20management
item.description: IBM Jazz based applications are vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 124355.

item.title: CVE-2021-29713|2024-09-16T16:32:30.155Z -- ibm -- rational%20collaborative%20lifecycle%20management
item.description: IBM Jazz Team Server products are vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session.

item.title: CVE-2021-20346|2024-09-16T16:12:46.143Z -- ibm -- rational%20collaborative%20lifecycle%20management
item.description: IBM Jazz Foundation and IBM Engineering products are vulnerable to server-side request forgery (SSRF). This may allow an authenticated attacker to send unauthorized requests from the system, potentially leading to network enumeration or facilitating other attacks. IBM X-Force ID: 194595.

item.title: CVE-2017-1281|2024-09-16T16:38:07.993Z -- ibm -- rational%20collaborative%20lifecycle%20management
item.description: IBM Rational Quality Manager and IBM Rational Collaborative Lifecycle Management 5.0 through 5.0.2 and 6.0 through 6.0.5 are vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 124759.

item.title: CVE-2018-1688|2024-09-16T16:58:12.505Z -- ibm -- rational%20collaborative%20lifecycle%20management
item.description: IBM Jazz Foundation (IBM Rational Collaborative Lifecycle Management 5.0 through 6.0.6) is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 145509.
